desc.p: The id of AM.VEH.LIST is the id of AM.PARAMETER record. Each AM.PARAMETER record will have a corresponding AM.VEH.LIST Record.
This file gives a list/sequence of containers. In conjunction with VEH.POINTER in AM.PARAMETER, this file identifies the current container that is in use.
When the HIST.DURATION in AM.PARAMETER is increased, the list expands by inserting the new containers after the current containers.
This field is populated with the container number.
